name: test_e2e_with_logs[178_CMD_SUB_004]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_SUB_004` |
| **Name** | System info via backtick substitution |

| **Subcategory** | command_substitution |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details
